00011 #if !defined(_OSSL_SSL_H_)
00012 #define _OSSL_SSL_H_
00013 
00014 #define GetSSLSession(obj, sess) do { \
00015         Data_Get_Struct((obj), SSL_SESSION, (sess)); \
00016         if (!(sess)) { \
00017                 ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "SSL Session wasn't initialized."); \
00018         } \
00019 } while (0)
00020 
00021 #define SafeGetSSLSession(obj, sess) do { \
00022         OSSL_Check_Kind((obj), cSSLSession); \
00023         GetSSLSession((obj), (sess)); \
00024 } while (0)
00025 
00026 extern VALUE mSSL;
00027 extern VALUE eSSLError;
00028 extern VALUE cSSLSocket;
00029 extern VALUE cSSLContext;
00030 extern VALUE cSSLSession;
00031 
00032 void Init_ossl_ssl(void);
00033 void Init_ossl_ssl_session(void);
00034 
00035 #endif /* _OSSL_SSL_H_ */
